monthly-o18.description: Monthly O18 concentrations in micro-mol O18 per mole (ppm) reported on the 2008A SIO manometric mole fraction scale. This is the standard version of the data most often sought.

monthly-o18-seasonal-adjustment.description: Same data after a seasonal adjustment to remove the quasi-regular seasonal cycle.  The adjustment involves subtracting from the data a 4-harmonic fit with a linear gain factor.

monthly-o18-smoothed.description: Smoothed version of the data generated from a stiff cubic spline function plus 4-harmonic functions with linear gain.

monthly-o18-smoothed-seasonal-adjustment.description: Same smoothed version with the seasonal cycle removed.

sample-datetime.description: The monthly values have been adjusted to 24:00 hours on the 15th of each month.

description: Monthly average O18 concentrations (ppm) derived from flask air samples.
name: scrippsco2-o18-monthly
